item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 12, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Happy 20th Birthday, Y Combinator (1013 points | 202 comments)
2. Show HN: VSC – An open source 3D Rendering Engine in C++ (18 points | 2 comments)
3. Beyond Diffusion: Inductive Moment Matching (20 points | discuss)
4. Happy 10k Day (72 points | 40 comments)
5. A look at the creative process behind Bluey and Cocomelon (44 points | 29 comments)
6. Fastplotlib: GPU-accelerated, fast, and interactive plotting library (358 points | 129 comments)
7. The Startup CTO's Handbook (136 points | 29 comments)
8. New tools for building agents (296 points | 111 comments)
9. Sorting algorithms with CUDA (64 points | 15 comments)
10. Show HN: Factorio Learning Environment – Agents Build Factories (637 points | 184 comments)
11. NASA to launch space observatory that will map 450M galaxies (196 points | 72 comments)
12. Launch HN: Sift Dev (YC W25) – AI-Powered Datadog Alternative (58 points | 42 comments)
13. The US island that speaks Elizabethan English (210 points | 115 comments)
14. A 10x Faster TypeScript (1483 points | 665 comments)
15. Australian man survives 100 days with artificial heart (112 points | 11 comments)
16. In contrast to Earth, Mars's middle atmosphere appears driven by gravity waves (57 points | 17 comments)
17. Tesco trials giant trolley scales in Gateshead (11 points | 20 comments)
18. AI-Generated Voice Evidence Poses Dangers in Court (120 points | 84 comments)
19. Show HN: We built a Plug-in Home Battery for the 99.7% of us without Powerwalls (254 points | 370 comments)
20. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
21. Show HN: Krep a High-Performance String Search Utility Written in C (128 points | 54 comments)
22. The Early History of Deferred Shading and Lighting (12 points | 2 comments)
23. What makes code hard to read: Visual patterns of complexity (2023) (294 points | 291 comments)
24. NIST selects HQC as fifth algorithm for post-quantum encryption (140 points | 100 comments)
25. When Crocodiles Attack: The Ramree Island Massacre (2013) (44 points | 47 comments)
26. Backyard Cyanide (115 points | 46 comments)
27. Modern Baby: A pioneering computer from Manchester (58 points | 7 comments)
28. What Is It Like to Be a Bass? Fish-Eye View Photography (1919–22) (12 points | 3 comments)
29. Mapping the University of Chicago's 135-year expansion into Hyde Park and beyond (195 points | 67 comments)
30. Show HN: Daylight – track sunrise / sunset times in your terminal (6 points | 1 comment)
